column4: hi, is there any way to connect to a shared gnome session from a Windows box?
I mean, I can connect via vnc but I'm not getting any display updates
how do you mean display updates
I have a still picture of the screen of how it was the moment I connected
across what kind of network are you connecting
this repeats when you disconnect and reconnect?
yup, I can control the remote machine but the screen isn't updating over vnc at all
I've never really gotten session sharing to work
its worth a try, cant really think of why it wont update in the first place, aside from a sluggish connection
a sluggish connection would mean slow updates
works with nouveau driver like I said
